install.name: lkncbjobsregister
install.author: Instant Php
install.description: NOTE: MAKE SURE THAT YOU ARE NOT USING VERSION 1.1 OF THIS PLUGIN. V1.1 WAS A SYSTEM PLUGIN. MAKE SURE YOU HAVE UNISTALLED OR YOU ARE NOT USING IT. This plugin helps you to register your users as job seeker or employer by community builder registration. please read read me.txt and blog post on instantphp.com

param.name: country
param.label: Default Country ID
param.description: Enter the ID of the default country id for the company countries. This value will be used , if the user enters a company data. You can find the id under List Countries link on your Jobs! control panel. YOU NEED TO WRITE THE COUNTRY ID CORRECTLY. YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED FOR THIS

param.name: default_resume_title
param.label: Default Resume Title
param.description: Enter title for the default resume like Default Resume or Default or etc.

param.name: default_resume_status
param.label: Default Resume Status
param.description: Select the status of the dfeault resume. The default one is Unpublished

param.name: default_resume_language
param.label: Default Resume Language
param.description: Enter language for the resumes like English or French.
